sn55.3:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn55.3:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena dīghāvu upāsako ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn55.3:4.3: Atha kho dīghāvu upāsako pitaraṃ jotikaṃ gahapatiṃ āmantesi:
sn55.3:4.5: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vanda:
sn55.3:4.6: ‘dīghāvu, bhante, upāsako ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn55.3:4.9: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena dīghāvussa upāsakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn55.3:4.10: “Evaṃ, tātā”ti kho jotiko gahapati dīghāvussa upāsakassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.3:4.12: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jotiko gahapati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.3:4.13: “dīghāvu, bhante, upāsako ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn55.3:4.16: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena dīghāvussa upāsakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn55.3:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena dīghāvussa upāsakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.3:5.3: Nisajja kho bhagavā dīghāvuṃ upāsakaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.3:5.5: Kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti;
sn55.3:5.8: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
sn55.3:5.12: itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.3:5.15: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato bhavissāmi akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.3:6.1: “Yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni desitāni, saṃvijjante dhammā mayi, ahañca tesu dhammesu sandissāmi.
sn55.3:6.9: “Tasmātiha tvaṃ, dīghāvu, imesu catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu patiṭṭhāya cha vijjābhāgiye dhamme uttari bhāveyyāsi.
sn55.3:6.10: Idha tvaṃ, dīghāvu, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī viharāhi, anicce dukkhasaññī, dukkhe anattasaññī pahānasaññī virāgasaññī nirodhasaññīti.
sn55.3:7.1: “Yeme, bhante, bhagavatā cha vijjābhāgiyā dhammā desitā, saṃvijjante dhammā mayi, ahañca tesu dhammesu sandissāmi.
sn55.3:7.2: Ahañhi, bhante, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī viharāmi, anicce dukkhasaññī, dukkhe anattasaññī pahānasaññī virāgasaññī nirodhasaññī.
sn55.3:7.3: Api ca me, bhante, evaṃ hoti:
sn55.3:7.4: ‘mā hevāyaṃ jotiko gahapati mamaccayena vighātaṃ āpajjī’”ti.
sn55.3:7.6: Iṅgha tvaṃ, tāta dīghāvu, yadeva te bhagavā āha, tadeva tvaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”ti.
sn55.3:8.1: Atha kho bhagavā dīghāvuṃ upāsakaṃ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
sn55.3:8.2: Atha kho dīghāvu upāsako acirapakkantassa bhagavato kālamakāsi.
sn55.3:8.3: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn55.3:8.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn55.3:8.6: “yo so, bhante, dīghāvu nāma upāsako bhagavatā saṃkhittena ovādena ovadito so kālaṅkato.
sn55.3:8.8: “Paṇḍito, bhikkhave, dīghāvu upāsako, paccapādi dhammassānudhammaṃ, na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesi.
sn55.3:8.9: Dīghāvu, bhikkhave, upāsako pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā”ti.
